PayPal Payment Provider Provider for uWebshop2.1
This package wil install the PayPal payment provider for uWebshop 2.1 It installs the PayPal Provider DLL and creates the PayPal Node in the Payment Providers Section.
Manual Installation guide:
In the root of your Umbraco site you'll find the "config" folder. Inside this folder is a "uWebshop" folder. There you will find the "uwbsPayment.config" file. (We advise the config folder package to be able to view config files from the umbraco backend)
You should add the following lines to the PaymentProviders.config file:
<provider title="PayPal"> <accountId>info@uwebshop.com</accountId> <url>https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr</url> <testURL>https://www.sandbox.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/webscr</testURL> </provider>
In the uWebshop section, under Payment Providers > Providers you'll create a new Payment Provider Node called "PayPal". The "Payment Provider Type" should be "Online Payment Provider" The Node Name" should be "PayPal" The DLLname is "uWebshop.Payment.PayPal.dll". The rest can be set to your own needs.
